string.name: about_us_desc
string.br: Boasting a rooftop pool, the Palestine hotel is a luxurious base in Ramallah, so is ideally situated for discovering Ramallah with the House of Representatives within a 10-minute walk and the Al-Irsaal street is also located within a 25-minute walk away.

string.name: features_desc
string.br:
Guests can soak up the outdoors on the terrace. Guests can take advantage of the recreational activities available, such as a Jacuzzi, a BBQ/picnic area, and a sauna.
Each elegant room at the Palestine hotel includes bathrooms that feature bathrobes and showers. They provide tea and coffee-making facilities, wireless internet access, and a flat-screen TV.

string.name: food_desc
string.br: Those staying at Palestine hotel can sample Thai and Italian dishes at the in-house restaurant, conveniently located for those who want to stay nearby at mealtime. A buffet breakfast is served each morning and room service is available for guests traveling at a more leisurely pace. A selection of dining options can also be found in the surrounding area.
